name: Black Currant Balsamic/Meyer Lemon Olive Oil Gift Box
description: Black Currant Balsamic de Modena and Meyer Lemon Olive Oil from Tunisia - Two 375 ml bottles in a gift box (gift box design may vary).

name: Fig Balsamic/Blood Orange Olive Oil Gift Box
description: Fig Balsamic de Modena and Blood Orange Olive Oil from Tunisia - Two 375 ml bottles in a gift box (gift box design may vary).

name: 18 yr old Traditional Balsamic/Picual Olive Oil Gift Box
description: 18 yr. old Traditional Balsamic de Modena and Picual Olive Oil from Australia - Two 375 ml bottles in a gift box (gift box design may vary).

name: Flight Tray - Chef's Flight
description: Five 5 oz bottles, including our most popular infused oils and aged balsamics.  Olive oils: Meyer Lemon, Fresh Garlic, Blood Orange, and Sweet Basil.  Balsamic: 18 yr old Traditional.  No chef should be without this assortment!

name: Flight Tray - Balsamic Lovers
description: Five 5 oz bottles of our aged Balsamic de Modena vinegars:  Cranberry Pear, Pomegranate, White Peach, Black Currant, and 18 yr old Traditional.

name: Flight Tray – Oil Favorites
description: Five 5 oz bottles of our popular extra virgin olive oils: Tuscan Herb, Blood Orange, Wild Mushroom Sage, Smoky Chipotle, Hojiblanca.  A little something for every taste.

name: Flight Tray - Custom Flight
description: Five 5 oz bottles of your choice. Please enter your five selections (olive oils and/or balsamics only) in the "Comments" section at Checkout.

name: One-Two-Three Set
description: Take one balsamic (Traditional 18-Year) and two oils (Meyer Lemon and Fresh Garlic), and you have three (or more!) ways to enhance food.  This set of three 5 oz bottles has everything needed for flavorful salads, stir-fries, marinades, dips, desserts (and more).

name: Imagination Set
description: For the creative cook.  This set features a 5 oz bottle of Blood Orange olive oil, delicious on salads, in marinades (salmon!) and in desserts (brownies!); and 5 oz bottles of Succulent Fig and Cranberry-Pear balsamics.  Imagine the creative culinary results!

name: You Pick Three Set
description: Customize your set of three 5 oz bottles.  Please enter your three selections (olive oils and/or balsamics only) in the "Comments" section at Checkout.

name: Citrus Trio
description: 2 oz bottles of citrus-infused olive oils (Meyer Lemon and Blood Orange) and a fruity balsamic (Pomegranate) add tasty highlights to salads and more.  Sauté vegetables with  Meyer Lemon.  Grill salmon with Blood Orange.   Pomegranate-infused balsamic adds the finishing touch.

name: Herb Trio
description: 2 oz bottles of Garlic and Herbes de Provence olive oils and 2 oz of Traditional 18-Year balsamic add flavor and fun to food.    These oils are great for dipping bread or tossing with salad.  Sauté vegetables with a splash of garlic.  A drizzle of aged balsamic enhances any dish.

name: Six Sampler
description: Sample some of our favorite combinations in a set that includes 2 oz bottles of Meyer Lemon, Garlic, and Picual Gold Reserve oils, and Black Currant, Traditional, and Cranberry-Pear balsamics.  Try with salads.  Sauté vegetables, marinate poultry, meat or seafood, dip bread, or just drizzle over a finished dish for extra wow.
